definition: to collude with/to collaborate/(basketball) hook shot
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Colludes , one of center's necessary techniques.
sentences.chinese: 勾手，中鋒必備的技藝之一。

sentences.english: Colludes , Yao Ming's another kind of weapon.
sentences.chinese: 勾手，姚明的又一種武器。

sentences.english: Famous like day hook Jiabaer, is by colludes is well-known the world.
sentences.chinese: 著名如“天鉤”賈巴爾，就是以勾手聞名天下。

sentences.english: He also has some nice hook shot moves inside.
sentences.chinese: 同時在內線他還有漂亮的勾手。

sentences.english: Colludes is one of Yao Ming quite commonly used weapons.
sentences.chinese: 勾手是姚明比較常用的武器之一。

definition: to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
to return a compliment/to give sth in return
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
